# Expanso Pipeline Examples

> Production-ready pipeline configurations for Expanso Edge. These examples demonstrate common data engineering patterns with downloadable YAML files.

## Documentation

- [Expanso Platform Docs](https://docs.expanso.io/llms.txt): Core platform documentation
- [Bacalhau Documentation](https://docs.bacalhau.org/llms.txt): Distributed compute engine
- [Main Website](https://expanso.io/llms.txt): Product overview

## Topic Files

- [Data Routing Patterns](/llms/data-routing.txt): Circuit breakers, fan-out, priority queues, content routing
- [Data Security Patterns](/llms/data-security.txt): PII removal, encryption, schema validation
- [Data Transformation Patterns](/llms/data-transformation.txt): Time windows, deduplication, format conversion
- [Log Processing Patterns](/llms/log-processing.txt): Filtering, enrichment, production pipelines

## Example Categories

### Data Routing
Patterns for controlling data flow through edge pipelines:
- Circuit breakers for fault tolerance
- Fan-out to multiple destinations
- Priority-based routing
- Content-based routing and splitting
- Smart buffering

### Data Security
Compliance and security patterns:
- PII removal and masking
- Field-level encryption
- Schema validation with dead letter queues
- Key rotation and audit trails

### Data Transformation
Transform and normalize data at the edge:
- Time window aggregations (tumbling, sliding, session)
- Event deduplication
- Format transformation (JSON, Avro, Parquet)
- Timestamp normalization

### Log Processing
Production log processing patterns:
- Severity-based filtering
- Log enrichment with metadata
- Multi-format parsing
- Production-ready pipelines with PII redaction

## Pipeline Configuration Format

All examples follow this structure:

```yaml
name: pipeline-name
type: pipeline
description: What this pipeline does
namespace: default
labels: {}
config:
  input: {}       # Data sources
  pipeline:
    processors: []  # Transformations
  output: {}      # Destinations
logger: {}
metrics: {}
```

## Quick Start

Download and run any example:

```bash
# Download an example
curl -O https://examples.expanso.io/examples/data-routing/circuit-breakers-complete.yaml

# Run locally
expanso-edge run --local --config circuit-breakers-complete.yaml

# Or deploy to Expanso Cloud
expanso-cli job deploy -f circuit-breakers-complete.yaml
```
